name: STANDING BARBELL
description: Hola a Barbell with an overhand grip in a standing position. Your feet should be shoulder-width apart and i will train properly

name: BARBELL OVERHEAD PRESS
description: Press the barbell by keeping it positioned in the meat of the hands and driving it directly overhead. I will supervise you with safety

name: SHOULDER WORKOUT
description: Set your feet shoulder-width apart. Let the dumbbells hang straight down from shoulders, your palms facing each other, with arms slightly bent.

name: STICK TO THE BASIC
description: What you need is to stick to the basic principles of preparation, success will follow. Start with planning

description: Shock your muscle into growth by rotating this workout with your current routine. I will make your routine and train you properly.
